Articles.Content:
Built by private contractors, funded by a currently unnamed corporation, the Defender MAC-1 (Medium Assault Craft) is a general purpose military vehicle. The Defender is a medium-range aircraft, equipped with six TRA-109 AreoSpike Engines and one AX-309 .

The standard Defender package comes fully equipped with two Devastator railguns, and adequate space for multi-purpose under-slung payloads.

Currently engineers are already preparing for version two where they plan to patch the 'no landing gear' issue.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

I\'m new to the whole spaceplane thing. Grade me, what\'s wrong with the design? How can I make it better? Share your thoughts with me.

Mods Used: C7+C7Experimental, Devastator Railgun.
